name: Big Joe and the Nazis
description:
back in the war days. back in the nazi days. back in the killing days. big joe. nazis. base. destroy kill destroy. big joe must destroy the nazi's base by clicking his mouse and shooting bullets.....shoot the base enough and it will be destroyed. kill the nazis so they dont destroy your base...... destroy base, win game...........back in the winning game days............now on itch.io................cool
